import React from 'react' import { UserLogged } from '../Store/UserContextStore' import { useContext } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' export default function Signin() { let user = useContext(UserLogged) const [error,setError]=useState() let navigate = useNavigate() function LogIn(e){ e.preventDefault() let name = document.getElementById('name').value let password = document.getElementById('password').value if(name===user.name && password===user.password){ user.SetError() navigate('/home',{replace:true}) }else{ setError('invalid username or password') } } return ( <> Log in
{navigate(-2)}}>
